00063 class OSIMTOOLS_API IKTrial : public Object  
00064 {
00065     OPENSIM_DECLARE_DERIVED(IKTrial, Object);
00066 
00067 //=============================================================================
00068 // DATA
00069 //=============================================================================
00070 private:
00071 
00072 protected:
00073     // name of marker file that contains marker locations for IK solving
00074     PropertyStr _markerFileNameProp;
00075     std::string &_markerFileName;
00076 
00077     // name of motion file that contains coordinate values for IK solving
00078     PropertyStr _coordinateFileNameProp;
00079     std::string &_coordinateFileName;
00080 
00081     // name of input analog file that contains ground-reaction and EMG data
00082     PropertyStr _analogFileNameProp;
00083     std::string &_analogFileName;
00084 
00085     // range of frames to solve in marker file, specified by time
00086     PropertyDblArray _timeRangeProp;
00087     Array<double> &_timeRange;
00088 
00089     // cut-off frequency for low-pass smoothing of kinematics data
00090     PropertyDbl _kinematicsSmoothingProp;
00091     double &_kinematicsSmoothing;
00092 
00093     // cut-off frequency for low-pass smoothing of ground-reaction data
00094     PropertyDbl _groundReactionSmoothingProp;
00095     double &_groundReactionSmoothing;
00096 
00097     // whether or not to include marker trajectories in the output data
00098     PropertyBool _includeMarkersProp;
00099     bool &_includeMarkers;
00100 
00101     // name of motion file (containing solved static pose) when done placing markers
00102     PropertyStr _outputMotionFileNameProp;
00103     std::string &_outputMotionFileName;
00104 
00105     // comment string
00106     PropertyStr _notesProp;
00107     std::string &_notes;
00108 
00109     std::string _optimizerAlgorithm;
00110 
00111     // These are initialized in initializeTrial, and used in solveTrial
00112     Storage *_inputStorage;
00113     Storage *_outputStorage;
00114     IKTarget *_target;
00115     IKSolverImpl *_ikSolver;
00116     int _startFrame;
00117     int _endFrame;
00118 
00119     // Whether or not to write write to the designated output files (GUI will set this to false)
00120     bool _printResultFiles;
